metadata.title: USN-3081-2 -- Tomcat vulnerability
metadata.description: Dawid Golunski discovered that the Tomcat init script incorrectly handled creating log files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain root privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3081-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libservlet2.5-java - 6.0.45+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2 libservlet2.5-java-doc - 6.0.45+dfsg-1ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
